adala kanthawa indiyawe sita siya daruwan dedenada samanga meratata pamina sangawa sitiyadi puththalama - weppamaduwa pradeshayedi pereda soyagaththa.emenma aya samanga dhiwara yathrawe pamini anek kanthawada eeye migamuwa pradeshaye niwasaka sagawa sitiyadi polis bharayata ganu labuwa.me athara nawika hamuda mulasthanaya niwedanayak nikuth karamin dhiwarayingen illa sitiye wideshiya dhiwara yathra ho nauka samanga muhude di sabandatha pawathwimen walakina lesayi.paya 24 pura kriyathmaka wana paridi wayambaa diga saha uthuru muhude aarakshawa thara kirima sandaha weralabada saha gambauru muhude nawika hamuda yathra menma nauka mura sanchara wadi kirimata piyawara gena thibenawa.
hamudawa wisin ginna madapawathwa athi athara, ginnen akkara 25ka pamana thekka gas winashayata pathwi athi bawa warthawe.
